labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Professional x64 - Fall Creators Update
data.actual_result: Overlay may not update at all, or just doesn’t updates for a moment or so. You are also unable to close it. (If you look into Discord, you will see that the overlay is still working aka being in a voice channel)
data.expected_result: You should see the overlay to update to whether you’re in a voice channel or not.
data.short_description: Discord Overlay Stop Showing/Updating Actions after Switching to Discord then back to Game
data.steps_to_repro: - Note: This is an separate issue rather than the master ticket as the overlay and the game did not stop working correctly fully. - Open a game, you may need to try several games as some games work fine and some games may not. For example: Garry’s Mod or Rainbow Six Siege  - After opening the game (full screen), try to open overlay.  - Once the overlay opens, switch back to Discord - Switch back to the game and attempt to interact with overlay
